Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Board
public class Board
extends Observable<Message>

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private static class  Board.boxChanged
    Represents class to keep track of the changes on the board

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<Board.boxChanged> action
    List that contains changes that take place on the board
    private Box[][] board
    Matrix 5 x 5 that represents the field.

  • Constructor Summary

    Board()
    Constructor which initializes each Box at TERRAIN level

    void addAction​(Worker w, int x, int y, Block b)

    Build specified block into specified coordinates and notify massage with changes

    Place the Worker reference in the x-y coordinates in board.
    void removeAction()
    Clears the list of changes
    void restore()
    Restores the board to following the list of changes until the first recorded change and notify all restored one by one.

    • board

      Matrix 5 x 5 that represents the field.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructor which initializes each Box at TERRAIN level

  • Method Details

    • getBox

      public Box getBox​(int x, int y) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the board matrix.
      y - y coordinate of the board matrix.
      Returns:
      Box at x-y coordinates.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if x or y are out of the board boundaries.
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

    • build

      public void build​(int x, int y, Block b) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Build specified block into specified coordinates and notify massage with changes
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate for the board
      y - coordinate for the board
      b - block to build
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if chosen coordinates go outside the board limits

    • placePawn

      public void placePawn​(Worker worker, int x, int y) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

      Place the Worker reference in the x-y coordinates in board.

      Parameters:
      worker - reference of the selected Worker
      x - x coordinate
      y - y coordinate
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if x or y is/are out of board boundaries.

    • initializePawn

      public void initializePawn​(Worker worker1, Worker worker2, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Place specified workers into specified boxes. It's used at the beginning of the game.
      Parameters:
      worker1 - first Worker owned by the Player
      worker2 - second Worker owned by the Player
      x1 - first Worker coordinate
      y1 - first Worker coordinate
      x2 - second Worker coordinate
      y2 - second Worker coordinate
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if x or y is/are out of board boundaries.

    • addAction

      public void addAction​(Worker w, int x, int y, Block b)
      Create a new Board.boxChanged object and adds it to the list of changes.
      Parameters:
      w - Worker responsible of the change
      x - changed coordinate
      y - changed coordinate
      b - changed Block

    • removeAction

      public void removeAction()
      Clears the list of changes

    • restore

      public void restore()
      Restores the board to following the list of changes until the first recorded change and notify all restored one by one.
